程序包 parser

类 Parser

java.lang.Object
parser.Parser
public class Parser extends Object
Parser. Give the input buffer (expr), use opp to parse.

  • 字段详细资料

    • buffer

      private ArrayList<Token> buffer
      input buffer (expr).

    • stack

      private ArrayList<Token> stack
      stack of opp to parse.

    • table

      private static int[][] table
      static opp table. It is used to give the action. 0 : shift 1 : reduce 2 : accept -1 : miss operator -2 : miss operand -3 : miss ( -4 : miss ) -5 : thriple error -6 : function error

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Parser

      Parser(String expression) throws exceptions.ExpressionException
      constructor. Buffer is the token list of expression Stack is empty. Add a $ at the end of expression.
      参数:
      expression - expr
      抛出:
      exceptions.ExpressionException - scanner will throw

  • 方法详细资料

    • getStackTop

      private Token getStackTop()
      Get the first terminal from the stack top
      返回:
      the terminal token

    • addInStack

      private Token addInStack(Token lookahead) throws exceptions.IllegalSymbolException
      The new token need to add in the stack.
      参数:
      lookahead - the token need to add
      返回:
      the real token type. It means change token to the like decimal or boolean.
      抛出:
      exceptions.IllegalSymbolException - not the defined type

    • getAnswer

      private double getAnswer() throws exceptions.TypeMismatchedException
      Get the expr answer from the stack.
      返回:
      The expr answer, a token.
      抛出:
      exceptions.TypeMismatchedException - The answer must be a decimal.

    • reduce

      private void reduce() throws exceptions.ExpressionException
      Reduce.
      抛出:
      exceptions.ExpressionException - excepiton in reducer.

    • shift

      private void shift(Token lookahead) throws exceptions.IllegalSymbolException
      Shift. Add the token to stack, and remove from buffer.
      参数:
      lookahead - The token need to shift.
      抛出:
      exceptions.IllegalSymbolException - error in addInStack

    • opp

      public double opp() throws exceptions.ExpressionException
      The opp. Compare the stack top and buffer top. Accroding opp table to make action. 0 for shift, 1 for reduce, 2 for accept. And negative for error.
      返回:
      the result.
      抛出:
      exceptions.ExpressionException - exception in the table.
